name: CovidBlaster (xsangyhix, Nicolas Nucifora, AndreiOlinic, Xardas143)
description:
CovidBlaster is a top down shooter with an pixel art aestethic

We've all been trapped in houses for almost 2 years now , so we decided we should take revenge on the little bastard.

The bug is the corona virus, and your mission is to eliminate it.

How to play 

Arrow Keys / WASD - Movement 

Left Mouse Button -  Primary Weapon 

Right Mouse Button - Secondary Heavy Shot
